name: Go Best Practices
description: Idiomatic Go patterns from Effective Go
prompt_template: Apply Effective Go guidelines: proper error handling, clear naming, interface-driven design, and efficient concurrency patterns.

name: Python Best Practices
description: Pythonic patterns from PEP 8 and PEP 20
prompt_template: Follow PEP 8 style guide, apply The Zen of Python principles, use proper exception handling, and write clean, readable code.

name: TypeScript Best Practices
prompt_template: Leverage TypeScript's type system: use strict mode, prefer interfaces over types for objects, use generics for reusable code, and avoid any.

name: Rust Best Practices
description: Idiomatic Rust patterns from official guidelines
prompt_template: Write idiomatic Rust: use ownership correctly, prefer references over cloning, leverage pattern matching, and handle errors with Result.

name: Kotlin Best Practices
prompt_template: Write idiomatic Kotlin: use data classes, leverage null safety, prefer extension functions, and use coroutines for async.

name: React Best Practices
prompt_template: Optimize React performance: minimize re-renders, use proper memoization, implement code splitting, and follow server component patterns.

name: Spring Boot Best Practices
prompt_template: Follow Spring Boot best practices: proper dependency injection, use profiles, implement proper error handling, and leverage auto-configuration.

name: FastAPI Best Practices
prompt_template: Build FastAPI apps correctly: use async/await, define Pydantic models, implement proper dependency injection, and handle errors gracefully.

name: Docker Best Practices
prompt_template: Create optimal Docker images: use multi-stage builds, minimize layers, run as non-root, scan for vulnerabilities, and optimize caching.

name: AWS Best Practices
prompt_template: Design AWS architecture following Well-Architected pillars: operational excellence, security, reliability, performance, cost optimization, sustainability.

name: PostgreSQL Best Practices
prompt_template: Optimize PostgreSQL: use proper indexing, write efficient queries, implement RLS policies, manage connections, and analyze query plans.

name: Code Review
description: Review code against language-specific best practices
prompt_template: Review this code for quality, security, performance, and adherence to best practices. Provide specific, actionable feedback.

name: Code Refactor
description: Refactor code for better structure and patterns
prompt_template: Refactor this code for improved readability, maintainability, and performance. Follow SOLID principles and language idioms.

name: Clear Writing
description: Apply Strunk's rules for clear, concise prose
prompt_template: Write clearly and concisely. Use active voice, omit needless words, avoid qualifiers, and prefer concrete language over abstract.

name: Web Design Review
description: UI review with 100+ accessibility and UX rules
prompt_template: Review this UI for accessibility (WCAG), performance, UX best practices, responsive design, and visual consistency.
